definition: (literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages

sentences.english: The range of an impaired child’s hearing ability is well defined in a quiet space.
sentences.chinese: 聽覺障礙兒童的聽閾是在一個安靜的地方測試出的。

sentences.english: Behavior threshold of audibility are usually computed with the threshold of V - wave reaction.
sentences.chinese: 鑑定中主要根據其V波反應閾值來評估主觀聽閾。

sentences.english: The cutting sound signal in audible range includes a plenty of tool-wear information.
sentences.chinese: 可聽閾內的切削聲信號包含着豐富的刀具磨損信息。

sentences.english: We suggest using the combined method to meas…
sentences.chinese: 建議採用上下行結合法測定純音聽閾。
